parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Assigns the soldier to turret.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''assignAsTurret''' [vehicle, [turretPath]]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [vehicle, turretPath]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> [turretPath]: [[Array]] - Array of numbers.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[assignAsTurret]] [BIS_vehicle, [0,1] ];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[assignAsCargo]], [[assignAsDriver]], [[assignAsCommander]], [[assignAsGunner]], [[assignAsTurret]], [[assignAsCargoIndex]], [[assignedVehicleRole]], [[unassignVehicle]], [[turretUnit]], [[moveInTurret]]
</value></part></template></root>
